org.sofof.command

Class Bind

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sofof.command.Bind
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Command, Executable, Query

    public class Bind
extends Object
implements Executable, Query, Serializable
    binds objects to binding name and saves them in the database. binding name should not have any signs can not be used as a file name in your system like /|\*:?" < > if you try to query this object after executing it, it will return list of the same objects with the generated ID
    Author:
    Rami Manaf Abdullah
    See Also:
    Unbind, Update, Serialized Form
